description:
Torimaru robs a house in Beika before running away. While fleeing, he pushes aside Genta on a mountain path. Later, he turns a corner and crashes into Gonno, causing the two of them to fall off a cliff. Genta and his friends look for the man who pushed him. Torimaru changes into the unconscious Gonno`s clothes and dresses Gonno in his own in order to frame him. Suffering from amnesia after hitting his head, Gonno encounters a partol officer near the station. Based on his clothes, the officer believes Gonno is the wanted robber...
Source: crunchyroll
